attributes.action: Refund a portion of the cost of fuel for haulage companies so that they will have  al evel playing field with foreign operators
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The ever rising cost of fuel (taxes)for haulage contractors is especially heavy to the small operator and I believe they should be refunded or be able to claim back some of this to put them on a level playing field with foreign operators.
